entry.title: TAG Heuer Wants You to Wear Your Bored Ape on Your Wrist
entry.summary: The move comes mere weeks after the luxury watchmaker began accepting cryptocurrency payments on its U.S. online store.

entry.title: Kraken Reaffirms Crypto-First Culture, CEO Says 'Triggered' Employees Should Leave
entry.summary: "The mission" above all, says CEO Jesse Powell, adding that "woke activists" among mostly new hires have been sapping company productivity.

entry.title: Ethereum Wallet MetaMask, Solana's Phantom Patch 'Demonic' Security Bug
entry.summary: The vulnerability meant that secret recovery phrases were sometimes stored on a user’s hard drive.

entry.title: Bitcoin Bounces as Fed Drops Biggest Interest Rate Hike Since 1994
entry.summary: Bitcoin again followed equities and dipped before recovering on the Fed’s latest interest rate hike.

entry.title: Superchief Gallery Embraces Degen Culture with Knife Throwing and NFTs
entry.summary: With physical NFT spaces in LA and NYC, these aren’t your typical art galleries.

entry.title: ApeCoin Hits New Low as Ethereum, Bored Ape NFT Prices Tumble
entry.summary: The Ethereum-based token is down 65% over the last 30 days, crashing harder than other gaming and virtual land tokens.

entry.title: Tether Hits Back at ‘Rumors’ Regarding its Commercial Paper Portfolio
entry.summary: The stablecoin provider issued a statement pushing back at ‘false rumors’ that its USDT coin is largely backed by Chinese and Asian commercial paper.

entry.title: Crypto Security Firm Forta Launches FORT Tokens
entry.summary: The token will reward cybersecurity researchers for contributing to its real-time blockchain network monitoring services.

entry.title: Dump Discord? Nansen Launches Messaging App for Web3 Communities
entry.summary: Analytics platform Nansen aims to take a bite out of Discord’s dominance with a new messenger service for NFT projects and more.

entry.title: Bill Gates: Crypto and NFTs '100% Based on Greater Fool Theory'
entry.summary: Billionaire philanthropist Bill Gates took aim at 'expensive digital images of monkeys,' voicing skepticism about NFTs and the cryptocurrency space.

entry.title: Celsius Rival BlockFi to Pay $1 Million to Iowa for Selling Unregistered Securities
entry.summary: The fine of almost $1 million to Iowa’s Insurance Division is part of a larger $100 million penalty that BlockFi agreed earlier this year with the SEC.

entry.title: SEC Chair Gensler: Crypto Bill Could ‘Undermine’ Existing Protections
entry.summary: The bipartisan Responsible Financial Innovation Act would shift some responsibility for the crypto sector from the SEC to the CFTC.

entry.title: SEC Opens Investigation Into Insider Trading on Crypto Exchanges: Report
entry.summary: At least one major crypto exchange has reportedly received a letter from the Securities and Exchange Commission regarding safeguards on its platform.

entry.title: Celsius Hires Restructuring Attorneys, Looking for Financing Options: Report
entry.summary: After freezing withdrawals on Sunday, crypto lending firm Celsius has reportedly turned to restructuring lawyers.

entry.title: Bitcoin Slips 10% to Test $20,000, Ethereum Down 15%
entry.summary: The crypto market’s slide has continued, with Bitcoin and Ethereum recording new 52-week lows every day this week.

entry.title: What Happens if Bitcoin Falls Below $20,000?
entry.summary: Bitcoin is down nearly 30% in the past week. Some experts believe it can still go lower.

entry.title: What Happened to Cool Cats? The Rise, Fall, and Future of the Ethereum NFTs
entry.summary: The collection’s CEO left after just three months and its average price is down 96% from its all-time high—despite signing with Hollywood mega-agency CAA.

entry.title: There's a Telegram for People to Scream Over the Bitcoin Crash
entry.summary: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!

entry.title: Bored Ape Ethereum NFTs Drop Below $100K for First Time in Almost a Year
entry.summary: As the crypto market suffers, the popular Ethereum NFT collection reaches a low entry price not seen since last August.

entry.title: NFTs and Knife-Throwing Abound at Superchief Gallery in LA
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin talks to Superchief Gallery co-founder Edward Ed Zipco about NFTs and the potential for digital art at Superchief's 10 anniversary showing in Los Angeles.

entry.title: MicroStrategy’s Saylor Shrugs Off Margin Call Concerns as Bitcoin Dips to $21,000
entry.summary: MicroStrategy faces a margin call on a $205 million loan if BTC falls further, but CEO Michael Saylor claims the company is "prepared to HODL through adversity."

entry.title: Crypto Winter Layoffs? Binance Is Hiring While Most Exchanges Are Firing, CEO Says
entry.summary: Many of Binance’s competitors, including Coinbase, have recently announced significant staff reductions.

entry.title: #DecryptLive: Luxury Fashion Brands Are Going Crypto
entry.summary: From Dolce & Gabbana to Balmain, big names in fashion are embracing crypto and NFTs. Decrypt's Stephen Graves, Dan Roberts, Sander Lutz and contributor Alys Keys discuss the trend.

entry.title: $102 Million Pulled Out of Digital Asset Funds Amid Crypto Crash
entry.summary: Digital asset funds saw outflows of more than $102 million last week, with Bitcoin accounting for $57 million of the total.

entry.title: '$25 Millions in Loans Against Monkey Pictures': Arcade Wants You to Collateralize Your NFT
entry.summary: "Blue chip" NFTs are driving millions of dollars in the growing NFT liquidity market, Arcade CEO Gabe Frank tells Decrypt.

entry.title: Collateralized Monkey JPEGs: CEO of Arcade Talks to Decrypt at Consensus
entry.summary: Arcade, an NFT liquidity provider, says it's facilitating $25 million in loans against blue-chip NFTs like Bored Apes. Arcade CEO Gabe Frank talks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson at Consensus 2022.

entry.title: El Salvador Finance Minister: Bitcoin Crash Poses 'Extremely Minimal' Fiscal Risk
entry.summary: El Salvador hasn't suffered any losses on its Bitcoin holdings, since it has yet to sell the cryptocurrency, the country’s finance minister argued.

entry.title: Coinbase Slashes Workforce by 18% to Prepare for 'Extended' Crypto Winter
entry.summary: "It is now clear to me that we over-hired," wrote Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong in a blog post announcing 1,100 layoffs.

entry.title: Balmain CMO: NFTs a 'Powerful Tool' For Luxury Fashion Brands
entry.summary: Luxury brands are leaning hard into the Web3 revolution—and wrestling with the challenges posed by decentralization.

entry.title: NYC Mayor Eric Adams Wants New York Governor to Veto State’s Bitcoin Mining Ban
entry.summary: Eric Adams wants Governor Kathy Hochul to veto a recent bill passed by the New York State senate to cap PoW mining at its current level.

entry.title: Tron's USDD Stablecoin Slips From Dollar Peg Amid Crypto Market Crash
entry.summary: Amid Monday's crypto market crash, Tron's stablecoin USDD lost its dollar peg, slipping to lows of $0.9764.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What is a Dapp?
entry.summary: A dapp is a decentralized app built on blockchains to give you more ownership and freedom in your digital life. Dapps are the next generation of software. Explore the vast selection of dapps on Ethereum today. Curious how to build dapps? Start building free at infura.io.

entry.title: Bitcoin Slips Below $21,000 Amid Rising Inflation Rates
entry.summary: Bitcoin briefly fell below $21,000 on Tuesday morning for the first time since December 2020, as investors anticipated a rate hike from the Fed.

entry.title: Jim Cramer Turns Bearish on Crypto. Is That Bullish?
entry.summary: The CNBC host says there is growing pessimism about crypto in Silicon Valley.

entry.title: Binance US Sued Over Promoting, Selling UST and LUNA
entry.summary: Plaintiffs allege the exchange was unlawfully selling unregistered securities and inaccurately described them as "safe" and "fiat backed."

entry.title: How the Celsius Liquidity Crunch Is Linked to Lido's Staked Ethereum
entry.summary: A core piece of Celsius's Earn strategy relies on Staked ETH not losing parity with Ethereum. But it has, and now customers want their money back.

entry.title: What Is Celsius and Why Is It Crashing?
entry.summary: The crypto lending platform paused withdrawals as Bitcoin spiraled downwards, sending its own token plummeting. Here’s what happened.

entry.title: NFT Floor Prices Sink Amid Crypto Crash, But Overall Sales On the Rise
entry.summary: Bored Apes, Moonbirds, and other top NFTs are losing value, but sales are up as buyers appear to be snagging bargains.

entry.title: Ethereum Flash Crash Sends Price Under $950 on Uniswap
entry.summary: ETH has lost 20% of its value over the last day, but the price sank even further on Uniswap overnight due to a huge whale sale.

entry.title: Crypto Layoffs Continue as Celsius Rival BlockFi Cuts Staff by 20%
entry.summary: The crypto lending firm cited a "dramatic shift in macroeconomic conditions worldwide."

entry.title: Coinbase, MicroStrategy, Other Bitcoin-Exposed Stocks Tank Amid Crypto Meltdown
entry.summary: Shares of MicroStrategy and Coinbase collapsed during premarket trading on Monday as the price of Bitcoin fell below $24,000.

entry.title: Binance Halts Bitcoin Withdrawals Due to ‘Stuck On-Chain Transaction’
entry.summary: The world’s largest crypto exchange, Binance, paused withdrawals of the world’s biggest cryptocurrency, Bitcoin, on Monday.

entry.title: Crypto.com Lays Off 5% of Corporate Staff, Citing 'Market Downturn'
entry.summary: Crypto.com joins other cryptocurrency exchanges Gemini, Coinbase, Bitso and Buenbit in making workforce cuts to prepare for crypto winter.

entry.title: Crypto’s Total Market Cap Slips Below $1 Trillion as Bitcoin Drops Under $24,000
entry.summary: Amid a wider crypto market rout, the total market capitalization of all cryptocurrencies dropped below $1 trillion on Monday morning.

entry.title: Bringing 'Snow Crash' to Life: Neal Stephenson Talks to Decrypt at Consensus
entry.summary: Neal Stephenson, who coined the term "metaverse" in his seminal novel "Snow Crash," speaks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson along with Bitcoin Foundation founder Peter Vessenes, about the new "free metaverse" they're co-launching, Lamina1.

entry.title: Edge CEO Paul Puey Talks 'Confidential' Bitcoin Mastercard Launch
entry.summary: Paul Puey, CEO of Edge Wallet, spoke to Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Edge's announcement of a new "confidential" crypto Mastercard. After Edge announced the card on Wednesday, Mastercard blasted crypto media to say it has nothing to do with the product—despite Puey telling Decrypt, "MasterCard is involved in entire process. They fully approved this, it’s fully legal and approved by MasterCard. It fits entirely within their framework.”

entry.title: gm: Christine Brown Left Robinhood to Go Full NFT
entry.summary: Christine Brown left her perch as Robinhood Crypto COO at the end of March to launch a new crypto venture. Now she has announced her new gig: Co-founder and COO at Floor, a token-gated NFT portfolio app that has raised an $8 million seed round. She talked to Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the company's plans, her own crypto and NFT bags, and her outlook on NFTs and on Robinhood.

entry.title: NBA's Spencer Dinwiddie Talks $26M Raise for Social Crypto App Calaxy
entry.summary: Spencer Dinwiddie's creator token platform Calaxy has raised another $26 million in funding. Dinwiddie tells Decrypt's Stacy Elliott what makes Calaxy stand out and why it can succeed.

entry.title: How To Change the 'NFTs Are Bad' Narrative: UnicornDAO Co-Founder Rebecca Lamis
entry.summary: Rebecca Lamis, who co-founded UnicornDAO with Nadya Tolokonnikova of the band Pussy Riot, sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson in Justin Aversano's new Quantum Art physical NFT space to discuss diversity and inclusion in Web3.

entry.title: Twin Flames Creator Justin Aversano Opens Physical NFT Space in LA
entry.summary: Quantum's Justin Aversano sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at the new Quantum Spaces in Santa Monica, CA. Justin discusses the gallery, his new project Doppelganger, and what's next for real-world NFT exhibitions.

entry.title: NFTs with Utility: STEPN, NFTY Labs, Wax, and Gomu Predict What's Next
entry.summary: Shiti Manghani of STEPN, Ty Blackard of NFTY Labs, William Quigley of Wax blockchain, and Spencer Yang of Gomu talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts about how the next era of NFTs will have utility and real-world use cases, as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.

entry.title: Kraken's Dan Held Talks Bitcoin Maximalism and Crypto Winter
entry.summary: Dan Held, a longtime Bitcoin influencer and now head of growth marketing at crypto exchange Kraken, talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts about Bitcoin maximalists (he calls himself a "mostamalist"), NFTs, and Crypto Winter as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.

entry.title: What Is Runner? 'Hunger Games' Co-Producer's Web3 Sci-Fi Project
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin speaks with Hollywood producer Bryan Unkeless and team members Bryce Anderson and Blaise Hemingway about their Web3 sci-fi project Runner, starting with an NFT project and a comic book all about racing.

entry.title: ‘The Irishman’ Exec Producer Niels Juul Gets Into NFTs
entry.summary: Decrypt’s Kate Irwin talks to veteran Hollywood film producer Niels Juul about why he’s going all in on NFTs and Web3.

entry.title: Decrypt at Cannes: Decentralized Pictures CEO Leo Matchett Talks Hollywood Embracing Crypto
entry.summary: Decrypt's Stephen Graves heads to the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he sits down with Leo Matchett of Decentralized Pictures, the Roman Coppola-backed nonprofit using crypto and blockchain voting to find, fund, and produce films.

entry.title: Decrypt at Cannes: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus on Funding Films with NFTs
entry.summary: Decrypt's Stephen Graves is on the scene at the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he spoke to Miguel Faus, director of the film "Calladita," who funded his movie by selling NFTs to backers including NounsDAO.

entry.title: gm: DraftKings Goes Crypto
entry.summary: Episode 10 of the gm podcast: Crypto and sports continue to converge, and one of the best examples is DraftKings. CEO Jason Robins joins Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts to talk about how DraftKings is embracing NFTs as prizes, when the company might accept crypto for entry fees and bets, and how his experience dealing with regulators and lawmakers mirrors what crypto companies are now going through in Washington.
